text: Ewa Maria Podleś (; 26 April 1952 – 19 January 2024) was a Polish coloratura contralto singer. She was known for her voice and a vocal range. She was known for roles as Rosina in Il barbiere di Siviglia, the title role of La Cenerentola, Isabella in L'italiana in Algeri and the title role of Tancredi. Podleś died from lung cancer at a hospice facility in Warsaw, Poland on 19 January 2024, at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Polish singers Category:Polish stage actors Category:Opera singers
title: Ewa Podleś
